title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Lodging              Lodging             Not a camper? There are several hotel/motels in the park for you. Each location is run by an official park concessioner.           Temple Bar Marina Resort    Click Here to go to their website  (928) 767-3211         Cottonwood Cove Resort & Marina    Click Here to go to their website (800) 255-5561         Lake Mohave Resort at Katherine Landing    Click Here to go to their website (928) 754-3245
